>
[Efficient Rituals](/Feats.aspx?ID=2044) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ritualist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=72)

**Prerequisites**
[Ritualist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2041)

</column>

---

You can perform some [rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=777) in less time. If the ritual normally requires 1 day to cast, you can cast it in 4 hours. If it takes longer than 1 day, you cast it in half the number of days, rounded up.

<title level="2">Efficient Rituals leads to...</title>
[Speedy Rituals](/Feats.aspx?ID=2046)
name: Efficient Rituals
